lines.text: Of course, the buzz word of the sixties was "Mini". Women wore them, men drove them.
And women drove them as well, Mike.
Yes, but not quite as well as the men. And like a woman, they were good to look at, and easy to handle.
Oh really? Well, mine was just like a man. It used to shoot off and stop immediately.

Buy a KYTV satellite dish, and you could win a family holiday to Paris...A year's supply of Versace clothing...And, you could live forever.... That's right, everlasting life could be yours, when you buy a KYTV Satellite Dish.
So let's start, and could you all spell out the names of your native countries. Maria, you first.
Very close there, but it actually ends in a Y. Next, Pierre.
Yes, but there's no such letter as uh, now Klaus.

[sniggers]
Not even one correct letter there!
